title: AI-Powered Security Operations Platform
description: Multi-agent agentic AI system integrating Splunk, Cortex XSIAM, and Nautobot with natural language interface. Automated threat intelligence gathering with real-time CVE scraping from 15+ sources. Enabled SOC analysts to query incidents conversationally.

title: Call & Case Analytics Pipeline
description: End-to-end platform for call center analytics: data ingestion → Azure Whisper transcription → LLM analysis → insight generation. Reduced manual auditor effort by 80% and operational costs by 60%+.

title: RAG-based Enterprise Knowledge Assistant
description: Enterprise Q&A system for HR/Finance/Admin policies with multi-format document ingestion (PDFs, DOCs, PPTs, images), semantic chunking, and vector search. Enabled organization-wide self-service policy access.

title: Quantum Key Distribution (QKD) Application
description: ETSI-compliant KMS and SDN controller with Trusted Node and Hub-and-Spoke architectures for long-distance quantum key sharing. Complete key lifecycle management with evaluated performance metrics (key rate, latency, network scalability).

title: Satellite Ground Station Control System
description: Natural-language test automation framework for multi-component orchestration with automated reporting capabilities. Streamlined satellite ground station operations and testing workflows.
